items.name: Jabi Lake Explorer Challenge
items.short_description: An exciting outdoor scavenger hunt and obstacle course set around the scenic Jabi Lake, perfect for teams and families.
items.address: Jabi Lake Park, Alex Ekwueme Way, Jabi, Abuja

items.name: Aso Rock Mystery Quest
items.short_description: Unravel ancient Abuja mysteries in this captivating indoor quest game, combining riddles, physical challenges, and local folklore.
items.address: Silverbird Galleria, Plot 1161, Memorial Drive, Central Business District, Abuja

items.name: Eagle Square Survival Challenge
items.short_description: A thrilling urban survival game where kids learn navigation, problem-solving, and basic survival skills in a controlled environment.
items.address: Adjacent to Eagle Square, Shehu Shagari Way, Central Business District, Abuja

items.name: Garki Forest Maze
items.short_description: Navigate a labyrinth of hedges and trails, solving riddles to find your way out. A fun and interactive experience for all ages.
items.address: Area 8, Garki II, Abuja

items.name: Wuse Kids Fun Palace
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor play center featuring multi-level soft play structures, ball pits, and slides for endless fun.
items.address: Aminu Kano Crescent, Wuse II, Abuja

items.name: Maitama Adventure Zone
items.short_description: An expansive indoor playground with climbing walls, trampolines, and interactive game zones designed for energetic kids.
items.address: Nile Street, Maitama, Abuja

items.name: Gwarinpa Play Haven
items.short_description: A cozy and safe indoor space for younger children, offering sensory play areas, building blocks, and gentle rides.
items.address: 3rd Avenue, Gwarinpa Estate, Abuja

items.name: Durumi Bouncing Beans
items.short_description: Focused on active play, this center boasts numerous bouncy castles, inflatable slides, and obstacle courses for high-energy fun.
items.address: Durumi District, Area 1, Abuja

items.name: Central Park Mini Golf
items.short_description: A vibrant 18-hole mini-golf course perfect for family outings and friendly competitions, set within a beautiful park landscape.
items.address: Central Park, Ademola Adetokunbo Crescent, Wuse II, Abuja

items.name: Utako Futsal Hub
items.short_description: Dedicated indoor futsal pitches for kids of all ages to practice their football skills, with coaching available.
items.address: Adetokunbo Ademola Crescent, Utako, Abuja

items.name: Jabi Skating Rink
items.short_description: An indoor roller-skating rink offering lessons and free skate sessions, perfect for children to glide and have fun.
items.address: Next to Jabi Lake Mall, Bala Sokoto Way, Jabi, Abuja

items.name: Garki Batting Cages
items.short_description: Practice your baseball and softball swings in safe, netted batting cages suitable for different skill levels.
items.address: Area 3, Garki, Abuja

items.name: Abuja Grand Illusion Theatre
items.short_description: Experience breathtaking magic and illusion acts by master magicians, promising a show full of wonder and surprise.
items.address: Transcorp Hilton Abuja, 1 Aguiyi Ironsi Street, Maitama, Abuja

items.name: Kids' Enchanted Stage
items.short_description: Interactive magic shows specifically designed for younger audiences, featuring balloon animals, close-up magic, and comedic acts.
items.address: Jabi Lake Mall, Bala Sokoto Way, Jabi, Abuja

items.name: The Illusionist's Workshop
items.short_description: A unique experience where children can learn simple magic tricks and understand the science behind illusions in a fun, educational setting.
items.address: Area 11, Garki, Abuja

items.name: Wuse Wonderland Wonders
items.short_description: A boutique theatre hosting intimate magic performances and storytelling with magical twists, ideal for younger kids.
items.address: Adetokunbo Ademola Crescent, Wuse II, Abuja

items.name: Abuja Underwater World
items.short_description: Discover a fascinating collection of fresh and saltwater marine life, including local Nigerian species and exotic fish.
items.address: Plot 101, Central Business District, Abuja

items.name: Eco-Marine Discovery Center
items.short_description: An interactive center focused on aquatic conservation, featuring touch tanks, exhibits on marine ecosystems, and a variety of colorful fish.
items.address: Federal Capital Territory University of Technology, Gwagwalada, Abuja

items.name: River Wonders Exhibit
items.short_description: Showcasing the diverse aquatic life found in Nigeria's rivers and lakes, educating visitors on local biodiversity.
items.address: National Children's Park and Zoo, Asokoro, Abuja

items.name: Oceanic Gallery Abuja
items.short_description: A small but captivating gallery dedicated to deep-sea creatures and coral reef ecosystems, with virtual reality experiences.
items.address: Ademola Adetokunbo Crescent, Wuse II, Abuja

items.name: Abuja Grand Circus Tent
items.short_description: A dazzling traditional circus featuring acrobats, clowns, animal acts (ethical), and thrilling performances for the whole family.
items.address: Adjacent to City Park, Wuse II, Abuja

items.name: Puppet Palace Garki
items.short_description: Charming puppet shows bringing classic fairy tales and local stories to life with beautifully crafted puppets and engaging narratives.
items.address: Area 7, Garki, Abuja

items.name: The Flying Trapeze Kids Circus
items.short_description: An interactive circus school where children can try their hand at juggling, clowning, and simple aerial arts in a safe environment.
items.address: Utako District, Abuja

items.name: Maitama Marionette Theatre
items.short_description: Elegant marionette performances retelling classic fables and modern tales with intricate string puppets and musical scores.
items.address: Mississippi Street, Maitama, Abuja

items.name: Abuja Junior Stargazer Dome
items.short_description: An immersive dome experience introducing children to constellations, planets, and the wonders of the night sky.
items.address: National Space Research and Development Agency (NASRDA), Obasanjo Space Centre, Abuja

items.name: Galaxy Explorers Planetarium
items.short_description: Interactive shows and visual journeys through the solar system, designed to spark curiosity about space science in young minds.
items.address: Shehu Yar'adua Centre, 1 Memorial Drive, Central Business District, Abuja

items.name: Star Dust Kids Observatory
items.short_description: A kid-friendly observatory offering safe telescope viewing of the moon and brighter planets, accompanied by engaging talks.
items.address: University of Abuja, Main Campus, Airport Road, Abuja

items.name: Cosmic Play Dome
items.short_description: Combines a planetarium experience with an interactive play area, where kids can build rockets and explore space-themed exhibits.
items.address: Wuse District, Zone 4, Abuja

items.name: Heritage Tales Garden
items.short_description: A tranquil park where professional storytellers weave captivating Nigerian folk tales and legends under shaded trees.
items.address: National Park, Area 10, Garki, Abuja

items.name: Whispering Woods Story Park
items.short_description: Follow interactive story trails with hidden surprises and listen to engaging narratives about nature and fantasy creatures.
items.address: Maitama District, along Shehu Shagari Way, Abuja

items.name: Fantasy Fables Lagoon
items.short_description: A whimsical park with themed zones dedicated to popular children's stories, featuring costumed characters and daily story readings.
items.address: Jabi District, near Jabi Lake, Abuja

items.name: Abuja Rhyme & Reason Grove
items.short_description: A creative space where children are encouraged to create and share their own stories and poems in an inspiring natural setting.
items.address: Lifecamp Area, Abuja

items.name: Abuja National Children's Zoo
items.short_description: A well-maintained zoo with a focus on African wildlife and conservation, offering educational programs and feeding sessions.
items.address: National Children's Park and Zoo, Asokoro, Abuja

items.name: Gwarinpa Petting Farm
items.short_description: An interactive petting zoo where children can safely interact with and feed friendly farm animals like goats, rabbits, and chickens.
items.address: 2nd Avenue, Gwarinpa Estate, Abuja

items.name: Critter Corner Discovery
items.short_description: A smaller, specialized zoo focusing on reptiles, birds, and small mammals, with expert handlers offering engaging presentations.
items.address: Wuse II, Abuja

items.name: Eco-Farm & Wildlife Sanctuary
items.short_description: Combines a sustainable farm experience with a sanctuary for rescued local wildlife, offering tours and educational insights.
items.address: Kwali Area Council, Abuja (Outskirts)

items.name: Abuja Brick Builders Hub
items.short_description: An expansive indoor space dedicated to Lego building, featuring massive display models, free-play zones, and building challenges.
items.address: Jabi Lake Mall, Bala Sokoto Way, Jabi, Abuja

items.name: Construction Junction Garki
items.short_description: A hands-on construction park where kids can operate mini-diggers, build with large blocks, and engage in safe, supervised 'construction' work.
items.address: Area 8, Garki II, Abuja

items.name: Tech Bricks Academy
items.short_description: Offers workshops on robotics and engineering using Lego Mindstorms and other advanced building kits for older children interested in STEM.
items.address: Wuse Zone 5, Abuja

items.name: Mini City Builders Club
items.short_description: A collaborative space where children can contribute to building a sprawling Lego city, fostering teamwork and architectural skills.
items.address: Maitama District, Abuja
